hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #5# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the #nine thrones room# of the Spirit Temple spiders hold...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ GS Nine Thrones Room West
Spirit Temple MQ GS Nine Thrones Room North

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top

hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Ice Arrows Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #2# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Arrows (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Did you know that Stalchildren leave you alone when wearing the Bunny Hood?
